scripts.test: npm run build && mocha --timeout 30000 -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register tests/test-*.ts
scripts.test-service: npm run build && mocha --exit --timeout 30000 -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register tests/test-0100-service.ts
scripts.test-transaction-service: npm run build && mocha --timeout 30000 -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register tests/test-0200-transaction-service.ts
scripts.debug-test-service: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0100-service.ts
scripts.debug-test-transaction-service: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0200-transaction-service.ts
